com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api

Interface ServiceLocator


  • public interface ServiceLocator
    Locates services.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<T>> doWithService(String name, java.util.function.Function<java.net.URI,java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<T>> block)
      Do the given action with the given service.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<java.net.URI>> locate(String name)
      Locate a service with the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • locate

        java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<java.net.URI>> locate(String name)
        Locate a service with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the service.
        Returns:
        The URI for that service, if it exists.

      • doWithService

        <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<T>> doWithService(String name,
                                                                              java.util.function.Function<java.net.URI,java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<T>> block)
        Do the given action with the given service. This should be used in preference to locate(String) when possible as it will allow the service locator update its caches in case there's a problem with the service it returned.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the service.
        block - A block of code that takes the URI for the service, and returns a future of some work done on the service. This will only be executed if the service was found.
        Returns:
        The result of the executed block, if the service was found.
